name: MediaQueryListEvent
description: The MediaQueryListEvent object stores information on the changes that have happened to a MediaQueryList object — instances are available as the event object on a function referenced by a MediaQueryList.onchange property or MediaQueryList.addEvent() call.

parameters.name: init
parameters.description: An init object that defines features of the new object instance. The available properties are: media: A DOMString representing a serialized media query. matches: A Boolean representing the media query status — true if it matches, false if not.

members.name: MediaQueryListEvent.matches
members.description: A Boolean that returns true if the document currently matches the media query list, or false if not.

members.name: MediaQueryListEvent.media
members.description: A DOMString representing a serialized media query.
